predicate.note: Frames file for 'weight' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: At the very least , the odds are heavily weighted [*-1] against the prospects of [*] preventing the Khmer Rouge and Cambodia 's communists from [*-2] ultimately moving against their opponents .
example.arg: the prospects of [*] preventing the Khmer Rouge and Cambodia 's communists from [*-2] ultimately moving against their opponents

example.name: with adverbials
example.text: Responses were weighted [*-1] on the basis of age and gender [*-1] to conform with U.S. Census data .
example.arg: on the basis of age and gender
[*-1] to conform with U.S. Census data

example.name: typical usage
example.text: ...traders said profit-taking weighed on the market, with blue-chips bearing the brunt of the selling.
example.arg: with blue-chips bearing the brunt of the selling
